content: Phase 2: Get design guidelines from design_agent
Phase 2: Install dependencies (TailwindCSS, Framer Motion, react-router-dom, react-helmet-async)
Phase 2: Backend - Create models (Lead, Product, Project, Blog, FAQ, Testimonial, City)
Phase 2: Backend - Create API endpoints (/api/leads, /api/products, /api/projects, etc.)
Phase 2: Backend - Seed initial content with Unsplash images
Phase 2: Frontend - Build Home page with all sections
Phase 2: Frontend - Build Company pages (About, Infrastructure, Quality, Process, Careers)
Phase 2: Frontend - Build Products pages (Windows/Doors landing + detail templates)
Phase 2: Frontend - Build Design Studio pages (Colours, Glass, Hardware, Inspirations)
Phase 2: Frontend - Build Solutions, Projects, Resources, Partner, Contact pages
Phase 2: Frontend - Build SEO Service Area dynamic pages
Phase 2: Implement lead forms (Get Quote, Site Visit, Contact multi-step)
Phase 2: End-to-end testing using Testing Agent
Phase 2: All user stories covered in Development and testing
